Pengamat Anggap Tak Masalah Kominfo di Bawah Menkopolhukam
04 Nov 2019, 15:16 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi (CNN Indonesia/Bisma Septalisma)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Pengamat menganggap penempatan Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika (Kemenkominfo) di bawah Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Politik, Hukum, dan Keamanan (Kemenko Polhukam) tidak menghambat industri digital. Hal ini diungkap Ketua Lembaga Riset Keamanan Siber dan Komunikasi CISSReC Pratama Persadha menanggapi pernyataan Apkomindo. Sebelumnya, asosiasi ini menyebut penempatan Kemenkominfo di bawah Kemenkopolhukam lebih membuat industri TIK kurang berkembang. Terutama terkait pengembangan industri perdangangan dan bisnis. "Saya pikir kalau menghambat industri digital tidak akan terjadi kalau Kominfo bisa bertindak profesional," Pratama saat dihubungi CNNIndonesia.com, Sabtu (2/11).Menurut Pratama, penempatan Kemenkominfo di bawah Kemenkopolhukam terkait dengan salah satu fungsi kementerian itu sebagai salah satu penjaga kedaulatan, keamanan, dan ketahanan negara. Sebab salah satu hal strategis yang dipegang Kominfo adalah menjadi regulator siber Tanah Air.Apkomindo juga khawatir Kemenkominfo bakal menjadi alat politis jika berada di bawah Kemenkopolhukam. Menanggapi hal ini Pratama menilai para pemegang kepentingan harus lebih banyak duduk satu meja dalam membuat kebijakan. Sehingga tiap pihak bisa menerima dan menjalankan kebijakan yang sudah ditetapkan Kemenkominfo. "Kementerian tidak boleh sewenang-wenang dalam membuat keputusan yang mempengaruhi ekonomi digital tanpa meminta masukan dari pelaku usaha, masyarakat ataupun akademisi. Koordinasi yang baik intinya." Selain itu, menurut Pratama, ekonomi digital hanyalah salah satu aspek yang ada di dunia siber. Sebab, menurut ekonomi digital tak sepenuhnya ranah Kominfo. Sektor ini beririsan dengan Kementrian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif hingga OJK terkait fintech (teknologi finansial). Sehingga ia mengimbau agar pembagian bidang pekerjaan yg jelas antara Kemenkominfo dengan Kemenparekraf. Dilansir dari laman Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi (Kemenpan RB), berdasarkan Peraturan Presiden (Perpres) Nomor 69 Tahun 2019 tentang Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif.Setidaknya ada lima hal yang menjadi tugas Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif, salah satunya mengembangan industri ekonomi kreatif. (din/eks)

Observers Assume No Problems with Communication and Information under Menkopolhukam
Nov 04 2019, 15:16 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration (Indonesian CNN / Bisma Septalisma)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Observers consider the placement of the Ministry of Communication and Information Technology (Kemenkominfo) under the Coordinating Ministry for Political, Legal and Security Affairs (Kemenko Polhukam) does not hamper the digital industry. This was revealed by the Chair of the CISSReC Pratama Persadha Cyber Security and Communication Research Institute in response to Apkomindo's statement. Previously, this association said that the placement of the Ministry of Communication and Information under the Ministry of Communication and Informatics had made the ICT industry less developed. Mainly related to the development of the trade and business industries. "I think that blocking the digital industry will not happen if the Ministry of Communication and Information can act professionally," Pratama when contacted by CNNIndonesia.com, Saturday (11/2). national sovereignty, security and resilience. Because one of the strategic things held by Kominfo is to become a cyber regulator of the Republic of Indonesia. Komkomindo is also worried that the Ministry of Communication and Information will become a political tool if it is under the Ministry of Politics and Security. Responding to this matter, Primary assessed that the stakeholders need to sit more at the same table in making policies. So that each party can accept and run the policies set by the Ministry of Communication and Information. "The ministry must not be arbitrary in making decisions that affect the digital economy without asking for input from business actors, the public or academics. Good coordination is essentially." In addition, according to Pratama, digital economy is only one aspect that exists in the cyber world. Because, according to the digital economy it is not entirely in the realm of Kominfo. This sector is aligned with the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy to the FSA related to fintech (financial technology). So he appealed for a clear division of labor between the Ministry of Communication and Information and the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy. Reported from the page of the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (Kemenpan RB), based on Presidential Regulation (Perpres) Number 69 of 2019 concerning the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy. creative. (din / ex)
